command.name: create
command.help: Create VLANs, LAGs, multicast groups, ACLs, etc.

argument.name: !<policer>
argument.help: The Policer number to create

argument.name: !<bank>
argument.help: The Policer bank to use

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Create a Policer with the specified number, and bank

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Create a Policer with the specified number, and a compiler selected bank

argument.name: !<policer>
argument.help: A policer number, a list of policer numbers, or all

command.name: del
command.help: Delete MAC address, VLANs, LAGs, or ports from VLANs, or counters from VLANs or LAGs

argument.name: !<policer>
argument.help: The policer to delete

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Compile and apply ACLs

argument.name: !<policer>
argument.help: The policer to configure

argument.name: cir
argument.help: Configure the committed policer parameters

argument.name: rate
argument.help: Configure the committed policer rate

argument.name: <rate>
argument.help: The committed rate in Kb/s

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Configures the committed policer rate

argument.name: capacity
argument.help: Set the committed policer max capacity

argument.name: <capacity>
argument.help: The committed capacity in KB

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Configures the committed policer capacity

argument.name: action
argument.help: Set the committed policer action

argument.name: drop
argument.help: Configure the committed policer to drop when above the programmed rate

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Configure the committed policer to drop

argument.name: markdown
argument.help: Configure the committed policer to mark down when above the programmed rate

argument.name: swpri
argument.help: Mark down the switch priority

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Configure the committed policer to markdown switch priority

argument.name: dscp
argument.help: Mark down the dscp priority

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Configure the committed policer to markdown dscp priority

argument.name: both
argument.help: Mark down both the switch and dscp priority

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Configure the committed policer to markdown both dscp and switch priority

argument.name: trap
argument.help: Configure the committed policer to trap when above the programmed rate

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Configure the committed policer to trap

argument.name: swPri_DSCP
argument.help: Configure the committed policer to set switch priority and dscp when above the programmed rate

argument.name: !<swpri>
argument.help: New switch priority to set when above the programmed rate

argument.name: !<dscp>
argument.help: New DSCP priority to set when above the programmed rate

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Configure the committed policer to set the switch priority and dscp

argument.name: swPri_VPri
argument.help: Configure the committed policer to set switch and vlan priority when above the programmed rate

argument.name: !<swpri>
argument.help: New switch priority to set when above the programmed rate

argument.name: !<vpri>
argument.help: New VLAN priority to set when above the programmed rate

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Configure the committed policer to set the switch and vlan priority

argument.name: eir
argument.help: Configure the excess policer parameters

argument.name: rate
argument.help: Configure the excess policer rate

argument.name: <rate>
argument.help: The excess rate in Kb/s

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Configures the excess policer rate

argument.name: capacity
argument.help: Set the excess policer max capacity

argument.name: <capacity>
argument.help: The excess capacity in KB

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Configures the excess policer capacity

argument.name: action
argument.help: Set the excess policer action

argument.name: drop
argument.help: Configure the excess policer to drop when above the programmed rate

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Configure the excess policer to drop

argument.name: markdown
argument.help: Configure the excess policer to mark down when above the programmed rate

argument.name: swpri
argument.help: Mark down the switch priority

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Configure the excess policer to markdown switch priority

argument.name: dscp
argument.help: Mark down the dscp priority

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Configure the excess policer to markdown dscp priority

argument.name: both
argument.help: Mark down both the switch and dscp priority

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Configure the excess policer to markdown both dscp and switch priority

argument.name: trap
argument.help: Configure the excess policer to trap when above the programmed rate

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Configure the excess policer to trap

argument.name: swPri_DSCP
argument.help: Configure the excess policer to set switch priority and dscp when above the programmed rate

argument.name: !<swpri>
argument.help: New switch priority to set when above the programmed rate

argument.name: !<dscp>
argument.help: New DSCP priority to set when above the programmed rate

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Configure the excess policer to set the switch priority and dscp

argument.name: swPri_VPri
argument.help: Configure the excess policer to set switch and vlan priority when above the programmed rate

argument.name: !<swpri>
argument.help: New switch priority to set when above the programmed rate

argument.name: !<vpri>
argument.help: New VLAN priority to set when above the programmed rate

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Configure the excess policer to set the switch and vlan priority

argument.name: color_source
argument.help: Set the color source for the specified policer

argument.name: green
argument.help: Assume all frames are green

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Policer assumes all frames are green

argument.name: dscp
argument.help: Determine color from DSCP field

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Configures the policer to extract color from the DSCP field

argument.name: swpri
argument.help: Determine color from switch priority

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Configures the policer to extract color from switch priority

argument.name: swpri_markdown_map
argument.help: Set the markdown switch priority map

argument.name: !<switch_pri>
argument.help: The switch priority to configure (0-15)

argument.name: !<downgraded_priority>
argument.help: The new switch priority, when downgrading. Red priorities should downgrade to themselves (e.g. 5 -> 5)

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Assign the downgrade

argument.name: dscp_markdown_map
argument.help: Set the markdown dscp codepoint map

argument.name: !<dscp>
argument.help: The dscp codepoint to configure

argument.name: !<downgraded_dscp>
argument.help: The new dscp codepoint, when downgrading. Red codepoint should downgrade to themselves (e.g. 5 -> 5)

argument.name: !<cr>
argument.help: Assign the downgrade
